author: mharwood
msg: Provided DTDs for core and contrib XML query syntax. The "docs" directory contains detailed documentation generated by DTDdoc from the DTDs. The ant script used to generate these docs is also included but not hooked up to the main build process due to license issues with DTDdoc.
